storyInfo: The Damazti Cluster reflects on the significance of their existence throughout history. Kal'tsit reflects on her longevity, and places her hopes for the future of the Sarkaz on W.

attributes.content: I often feel that the times change with irregularity.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: Their means of coming up with concepts so brilliant, their methods of forming societies so diverse, it's all dizzying.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: I've lived in Kazimierz many times, and every time I leave, I end up coming back. To tell you the truth, Banshee, traces of us are still present in that land of knights.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: I must admit the place is indeed fascinating.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: Yet you didn't have me sketch out those neon lit skyscrapers for you.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: You simply... chose this ordinary village for the stage this time.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Because it's much quieter here, and it's Kazimierz as I first saw it.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: Golden farmlands amid the never ending plains. It's a pity that these are probably no longer important to the Kazimierz of today.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: What do you think, how does it compare to Kazdel?
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: Kazdel is a land of ruin, but the rubble also means that there are countless possibilities beneath it.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Our visions of Kazdel may have their differences, but we can still look forward to its next iteration.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: And as for Kazimierz, it evolved so fast that in the blink of an eye, the Pegasi along with their morals and glory dispersed and withered away.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: And it became even sweeter, more fascinating...
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: The descendants of the Elders and the Ancients accuse us Sarkaz of devouring their flesh and blood, and enslaving their souls. So they found a new method, and they did it even better than us.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: They let those under their rule be fed, swallowed, turned into nourishment for their monster to continue expanding and grow.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: And all they have to pay is a promise of the pleasures of life.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: I searched for Kazimierz's rulers, intrigued by what they had created, but instead I only discovered...
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: No, there was no ruler, those company spokesmen, those members of the General Chamber of Commerce, even the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi or the Grand Knight, you could not call any of them a ruler of Kazimierz.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: Inflated desire is so powerful that it can rule itself.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: Is a simple thirst for survival enough to keep up with your search, Damazti?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: You're more restless than I imagined, what exactly are you afraid of?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Of sinking, deep into the past and history.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: I just want to understand...
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: How to get along with ourselves.
attributes.name: 'Kazimierzian'

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hey, Kal'tsit. Not lookin' so hot, hm?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Where am I...?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Why not sleep in a little longer? I need some more time to get a bomb under your pillow.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm guessing you're probably not in the best mood, waking up to see me, of all people. The feeling's mutual.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'd rather die than let someone think I've been hovering over your bed, day after day with tears in my eyes, praying with all my heart and soul that you'd open your eyes.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Believe me, this is just a coincidence. I only came looking for water, and you just happened to be in my spot.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Where are the Doctor and Amiya?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wanna take a guess?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Maybe I killed them both while you were taking a lazy cat nap.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Sounds like they're both fine, for now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You have so much faith in me?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What's our present location?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The outskirts of Londinium, in a safehouse of mine. The courtyard out there is packed with a whole bunch of your people right now.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Is this favor of mine part of your grand plan too, Kal'tsit? You can try thanking me from the bottom of your heart, and I'll consider accepting your gratitude.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ascalon and I did work out several plans, and we did consider enlisting the help of ex-Babel members for the worst-case scenarios.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I always knew you were so good at calculating everyone's usefulness—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But, I have to thank you, W.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As you requested, from the bottom of my heart.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Did Theresis smash your head in too hard? Should I call Shining?
attributes.name: W
Kal'tsit
attributes.content: Ugh—
W.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I was kidding about calling Shining, by the way. Getting a brain injury wouldn't necessarily be the worst thing for you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Can you... help me up? I need to get out of bed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Water for you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Withdrawing from Londinium was an extremely risky operation. Can you tell me the current situation?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You sure you wanna ask me? Closure's busy getting those temporary barracks up now, but we could keep our distance from each other till she gets back.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I want to hear it from you. Mercenaries have a keener sense of danger.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your Self-Salvation Corps got played by Manfred, hard.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: He and his little sidekick seem to have found just the right time to take you guys out. The way I see it, these poor city folk were never a match for sharp-edged blood-licking Sarkaz scum.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And now your poor wretches are being driven out of Londinium, which honestly to me, is a good thing. It's way better than dying in some alley for nothing.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The only good news is that the dukes finally got moving. That bitch Ines tells me the Doctor and the little bunny were kidnapped by a certain duke who wants to use them to do a favor.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: A duke...?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So a war has broken out after all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Isn't it tragic? You've missed out on all sorts of excitement.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Any regrets, Kal'tsit? Seems like your gigantic brain didn't get you the results you wanted.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I've never regretted my actions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But sometimes I feel...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...exhausted.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wow. So you're actually capable of such a show of emotion? I gotta grab this once-in-a-lifetime chance to take a selfie with a poor, miserable Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I won't pretend to be the type who hides in the shadows and gropes in the direction of history, although sometimes I do hope that things go my way.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I... and my past selves have tried many approaches. Some have been successful, while others in hindsight have proven to be questionable.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I still maintain that every choice has been made with rational judgement, and was the optimal choice at the time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmph. Optimal, huh?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: 'Optimal...' Using such a term does make it sound like all related problems were solved.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But that's not really the case. I can only ensure that things don't turn out for the worst.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But no matter how I try, the results often prove to me that the impact an individual can make is always limited in the end.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No matter who it is.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even if this name, 'Kal'tsit,' and the memories she carries have been walking these lands for so long, what I can accomplish... might be called insignificant.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: W, I... I destroyed Kazdel once. The me that I was then believed that it was the only way to bring peace.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We managed to behead The Lord of Fiends then, and we were victorious, for all intents and purposes. According to our plans, we should have reclaimed the King's authority.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I had prepared all kinds of plans, and the successors were under my supervision.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But at that moment Theresa... chose to pick up the black crown.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hey, I'm not here for a history lesson.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But I'm awful curious, Kal'tsit. Why did you and her put Babel together anyway? What exactly do the Sarkaz mean to you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If you're just trying to play with our lives, she... Theresa wouldn't be on your side.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We found that, in actuality, the Sarkaz aren't so different than the rest of us as we had originally thought. Not inferior to any other race, nor nobler than any other existence.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No matter where we've come from, Originium has changed us all into a similar form, possessing the same emotions and desires.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This land is currently in an ugly state. The Sarkaz souls whisper of being the former masters of this world, and they were slaughtered, oppressed, displaced for countless millennia.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have seen the times of old. I was there when only Sarkaz walked on the land.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In fact, the term 'Sarkaz' actually originates from an arrogant abbreviation of their murderers, though it has also become a rallying cry for the victims.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The difference between a Djall and Goliath is huge, and so is the stark contrast in appearance between a Cyclops and a Diαblo, but why have they all been classified as common 'Sarkaz?'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If a Vampire establishes his own country, how would it be any different from the arrogant Victoria of today? If a Nachzehrer were to rule all civilization, how would the culture be any different from those under the ice-cold rule of Ursus?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Theresa and I came to the conclusion that these conflicts ultimately lead nowhere.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She dived so deep into the Lord of Fiends' memories, and realized what I had feared was indeed possible.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Our time... or rather, all time for these lands, this world, is running out.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Why are you telling me all this? Didn't I say I'm not into history?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's precisely because you're not, W.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: History has made Vampires, Liches, Nachzehrer, Damazti, Gargoyles... made all of you into Sarkaz, but it has also bound the Sarkaz to their past.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kazdel shall be rebuilt, but what will it be rebuilt on?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Perhaps someone like you would have a different answer than I do, W.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Are you still worried about Catherine, Feist?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: The wounded have settled down for the time being. That Sarkaz mercenary called W... she's really capable.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: The Self-Salvation Corps are already re-organizing themselves, and I think we'll be back in Londinium in no time.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Oh yeah.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Rockrock, did you see anyone yesterday night?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You mean like Sarkaz troops?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: No, of course not, strangers, or... I don't know actually.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I received a letter... it was in my suitcase this morning.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Wasn't it written by a Self-Salvation Corps soldier?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: The handwriting's really familiar to me, but no one's coming to mind.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The letter said that Granny is in Londinium safe and sound, and I needn't worry.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: And... it also contained several addresses, not very far from here.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The only person who would do such a thing, would be a certain duke.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But that duke isn't a Londinier.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Don't worry, I know exactly whose side I'm stood on.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: No matter what those bigwigs think of us... we're not their pawns.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: They think the war is just a scramble for power, and that we don't have the right to make our own choices.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The Self-Salvation Corps will show them all they're sorely mistaken.
attributes.name: Feist
